info.name: Car Wash Backend API 2
info.description: Postman collection for Car Wash Backend API

request.description: Register a new admin user. This typically requires existing admin privileges to execute.

header.description: Requires an existing company admin token

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Company Admin User",
  "username": "companyadmin",
  "email": "admin@company.com",
  "password": "securePassword123",
  "accountType": "company",
  "phone_number": "123-456-7890",
  "address": "123 Admin Ave, Anytown",
  "is_admin": true
}

request.description: Register a new company with admin privileges. This typically requires existing company admin privileges to execute.
Login as a company with admin privileges

body.raw:
{
  "product_name": "Car Wax",
  "description": "Premium car wax for a long-lasting shine",
  "price": 19.99,
  "stock": 100,
  "sub_category_ids": [1]
}

request.description: Add a super-admin employee with the highest level of privileges within a company
Add a manager employee with intermediate privileges within a company
Promote a regular user to an admin (requires admin privileges)
Demote an admin user to a regular user (requires admin privileges)
Get all companies pending approval (requires admin privileges)

item.name: Company Admin Operations

request.description: Promote a regular user to a company admin (requires company admin privileges)
Demote a company admin user to a regular user (requires company admin privileges)
